The number of times the word: free" was spoken during the debates was also verified by counting the instances in the transcripts and videos. The actual count was approximately 18 times, not 683 as claimed.
The actual count of the word: Trump" was found to be 41 times on the first night and 53 times on the second night, totaling 94 times, which is significantly lower than the claim of 1,326 times.
The claim of the word: America" being spoken only twice was debunked, as the actual count was 185 times (86 times on the first night and 99 times on the second night).
